1. Open up Terminal
2. Type “python “ (with trailing space)
3. Drag refreshCache.py onto Terminal window to get complete path
4. Hit return
5. A CSV and JSON file will be generated in the /cache folder.
6. Write a commit message like "update cache"
7. Press “Commit to master” (cmd+return)
8. Sync the repository in GitHub (cmd+s)
9. Navigate to https://researchinnovationoutreach.github.io in chrome, do a hard refresh if necessary
